text: The Tour des Pyrénées was a road bicycle race held annually in France and Spain. It was organized as a 2.2 event on the UCI Europe Tour. ==Winners== ==References== Category:UCI Europe Tour races Category:Cycle races in France Category:1995 establishments in France Category:2010 disestablishments in France Category:Recurring sporting events established in 1995 Category:Cycle races in Spain Category:Defunct cycling races in France Category:Defunct cycling races in Spain
title: Tour des Pyrénées
